/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly white and red, with occasional blue and green accents adding a touch of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. Cars and pedestrians can be seen in the distance, adding a sense of movement and life to the scene.
